attributes.action: make more jobs for people under theage of 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i tink that there should be more jobs made to persons under the age of 18. this is because i am 17 and finding it hard to find a full time job that can give me the right amount ofmoney to be able to pay formy rent myphone bill and my car insurance let alone the car itself.
